name: obstacle_course_seed123
description: Complete the obstacle course by navigating over, pushing, kicking, and jumping on objects.

children.name: Navigate_and_Jump_Over_LowWall
children.description: Approach the low wall and jump over it to the other side.

children.name: walk_to_lowWall
children.description: The robot should walk until it is positioned directly in front of the low wall, ready to initiate a jump. The goal state is the robot being stable and within optimal jumping distance of the low wall.

children.name: jump_over_lowWall
children.description: The robot should perform a jump action to clear the low wall, landing on the opposite side. The goal state is the robot having successfully cleared the low wall and landed on the other side, potentially in an unstable state.

children.name: stabilize_after_jump
children.description: The robot should regain its balance after landing from the jump. The goal state is the robot being in a stable, standing position on the far side of the low wall, ready for the next task.

children.name: Push_LargeSphere_Into_HighWall
children.description: Locate the large sphere, approach it, and push it into the high wall to knock the wall over.

children.name: walk_to_largeSphere
children.description: The robot should walk until it is positioned near the large sphere, ready to interact with it. The goal state is the robot being stable and within pushing distance of the large sphere.

children.name: push_largeSphere_into_highWall
children.description: The robot should apply force to the large sphere, pushing it directly towards the high wall until the sphere collides with and pushes over the high wall. The goal state is the large sphere having moved and the high wall having fallen over.

children.name: Kick_SmallSphere_Away_From_Wall
children.description: Approach the small sphere and kick it away from its current position.

children.name: walk_to_smallSphere
children.description: The robot should walk until it is positioned near the small sphere, ready to interact with it. The goal state is the robot being stable and within kicking distance of the small sphere.

children.name: kick_smallSphere_away_from_wall
children.description: The robot should perform a kicking motion to propel the small sphere away from its current position near the wall. The goal state is the small sphere having moved a significant distance away from its original location.

children.name: Navigate_and_Jump_On_BlockCube
children.description: Approach the block cube and jump on top of it.

children.name: walk_to_blockCube
children.description: The robot should walk until it is positioned directly in front of the block cube, ready to jump onto it. The goal state is the robot being stable and within optimal jumping distance of the block cube.

children.name: jump_on_top_of_blockCube
children.description: The robot should perform a jump action to land on top of the block cube. The goal state is the robot being stable and standing on the top surface of the block cube.
